name: [r.u.s.h.] Parkour Prototype 2
description:
[r.u.s.h.] is a sequel to Vacancy Unlimited. Trapped in an alternate reality and cut off from his powers, Geoff joins runners unlimited a group of renegades to find his way home. This is the second prototype I've made to test mechanics and level design before starting Steam Early Access. 

3 new zones have been added for this prototype.  Included are levels from prototype 1 as well as an NPC testing arena.

Utility featured in this prototype are the weapons above and grapple poppers from VU.  Melee is also featured using right click for light attacks and mouse 4 for slam attack.  A kick attack acts as an extra jump by pressing Q. E dashes forward with the Astral Blip ability.

This game will take place in the Apastron Universe, a collection of games that take place in the same universe. This game is a direct sequel to Vacancy Unlimited.
